transferEth(address).details: msg.sender needs to send ETH in msg.value

transferToken(address,address,uint256).details: sender needs to approve tokens to this contract before calling this function.

params.amount: number of ERC20 tokens to transfer.

transferEth(address).notice: transfers ETH from msg.sender to recipient.

transferToken(address,address,uint256).notice: transfers ERC20 from msg.sender to recipient.
